subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brady Quinn, the former Notre Dame quarterback, has come to the N.F.L. scouting combine to patch the leak in his reputation, a chore complicated because he cannot figure out what is causing it.
snippet: Brady Quinn, the former Notre Dame quarterback, has come to the N.F.L. scouting combine to patch the leak in his reputation, a chore complicated because he cannot figure out what is causing it.
